Package helpers

Class GameBuilder

java.lang.Object
helpers.GameBuilder
public class GameBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
Helper class to initialize the populate the board with pieces, thus creating an initial boars state.

  • Method Details

    • getStartingBoard

      public static Board getStartingBoard​(java.lang.String levelName) throws java.io.IOException
      Constructs a initial board state based off of the level passed in.
      Parameters:
      levelName - the desired level, and thus difficulty, of the game
      Returns:
      an instance of Board initialized with pieces and terrain corresponding to the level passed in
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • setDefaultTerrain

      private static void setDefaultTerrain​(Board board)
      Helper function to create the initial terrain of the board
      Parameters:
      board - the board to populate with terrain squares
